name: Ghost In The Graveyard (With A Shotgun)
name_original: Ghost In The Graveyard (With A Shotgun)
description:
Welcome to our game!

How to Play: 

Hold Space to charge your jump.

Release space to jump!

You are able to jump twice before touching the ground.

Beware the ghosts!

We hope you enjoy playing Ghost In The Graveyard (With a Shotgun). In this game, you play as the Skeleton walking through the graveyard trying to get as far as his thick bones take him before the ghosts return him to the earth! Let us know how far you get in the comments and drop any suggestions or improvements you have as well! Once again thank you for playing, this is our team's (friend group's) first game-jam and we had a great time. 

Team-Lead: Spencer T.

Developer: Aidan G.

Developer: Ethan S.

Developer: Peter S.

Art Director: Maker C.

Music Director: Carter W.
